lyric:
[00:15.55]We were both young when I first saw you
[00:18.77]I close my eyes, and the flashback starts
[00:22.56]I'm standing there
[00:25.27]On a balcony in summer air
[00:30.33]See the lights, see the party, the ball gowns
[00:33.99]See you make your way through the crowd
[00:37.50]And say, "Hello"
[00:40.73]Little did I know
[00:44.12]That you were Romeo, you were throwing pebbles
[00:48.65]And my daddy said, "Stay away from Juliet"
[00:52.20]And I was crying on the staircase
[00:54.64]Begging you, "Please don't go," and I said
[01:00.09]Romeo, take me somewhere we can be alone
[01:04.07]I'll be waiting, all there's left to do is run
[01:07.63]You'll be the prince and I'll be the princess
[01:11.50]It's a love story, baby, just say "Yes"
[01:15.62]Romeo, take me somewhere we can be alone
[01:19.11]I'll be waiting, all there's left to do is run
[01:23.00]You'll be the prince and I'll be the princess
[01:26.82]It's a love story, baby, just say "Yes"
[01:30.60]"Romeo, save me, I've been feeling so alone
[01:34.15]I keep waiting for you but you never come
[01:37.78]Is this in my head? I don't know what to think"
[01:41.44]He knelt to the ground and pulled out a ring, and said
[01:45.36]Marry me Juliet
[01:47.03]You'll never have to be alone
[01:49.19]I love you and that's all I really know
[01:52.56]I talked to your dad, go pick out a white dress
[01:54.98]It's a love story, baby, just say 'Yes'"
[02:00.77]Marry me Juliet
[02:02.30]You'll never have to be alone
[02:04.09]I love you and that's all I really know
[02:07.62]I talked to your dad, go pick out a white dress
[02:11.66]It's a love story, baby, just say 'Yes'"
